Title: Relates to directing health inspectors to oversee compliance of restaurants and food establishments in N.Y. city
Summary: Relates to directing cities with a population of one million or more which employ health inspectors to oversee compliance of restaurants and food establishments; enacts the "Restaurant Owner Whistleblower Protection Act".
ActClause: AN ACT to direct cities with a population of one million or more which employ health inspectors to oversee the compliance of restaurants and food establishments
